summary: HAD TRANSMISSION PROBLEM ON MY 99 HONDA ODYSSEY. REPLACED IT AT 60000 MILES AT AAMCO TRANSMISSION. HONDA DENIED MY CLAIM BECAUSE I DID NOT BRING IT TO THE DEALER. NOW AT 90000 MILES, THE ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AGAIN AND THE SHIFTING FEELS ROUGH. THIS IS A DESIGN PROBLEM THAT HONDA TRIES TO IGNORE. THIS TRANSMISSION PROBLEM CAN CAUSE AN ACCIDENT IF THE SECOND GEAR DOES NOT ENGAGE WHILE WE ARE ON THE FREEWAY.    *NLM
